startTitle: Click on the cards to find a match

welcome.hello2: ! Choose a level and let's start the game.

rules.rule1: The Memory Game, also known as Match Match, is a classic board game in which players turn around picture cards and try to find pairs.
rules.rule2: Players can choose a difficulty level that determines the number of cards on the field:
rules.rule6: Players can choose the total time of the game.
rules.rule7: A player gets a certain total time to complete the entire game. Once the timer is counted down, the game ends.
rules.rule8: Each turn a player reveals two cards.
rules.rule9: If the images on the revealed cards match, the player gets points and the right to an additional turn.
rules.rule10: If the images do not match, the cards are returned face down.
rules.rule11: The goal of the game is to find all pairs of cards.
rules.rule12: The game ends when all pairs have been found or time has expired.
